DOC.brief_summary: This study is designed to determine the safety of RSD1235 in patients with atrial fibrillation.
DOC.brief_title: Study of RSD1235 to Evaluate Safety in Patients With Atrial Fibrillation
DOC.criteria: Subject must have symptomatic AF Subject must have adequate anticoagulant therapy Subject may not have Class IV congestive heart failure. Subject may not have uncorrected electrolyte imbalance.
